title: Tiger Burning Bright
brightcove_name: 100 Greatest Moments In Sports - No. 43 - Tiger Burning Bright
brightcove_short_desc: Tiger Woods dominated the field at Pebble Beach, winning the third major championship of his career. Finishing at -12, his 15-stroke margin of victory set a new tournament record, breaking Tom Morris’s 1862 mark.
brightcove_long_desc: Tiger Woods dominated the field at Pebble Beach, winning the third major championship of his career. Finishing at -12, his 15-stroke margin of victory set a new tournament record, breaking Tom Morris’s 1862 mark.
headline: Tiger Burning Bright
page_title: Tiger Woods record victory at 2000 U.S. Open
body: Tiger Woods dominated the field at Pebble Beach, winning the third major championship of his career. Finishing at -12, his 15-stroke margin of victory set a new tournament record, breaking Tom Morris’s 1862 mark.
